zh.question: 《黑客帝国》这部作品的主题是什么？
zh.answer:
"黑客帝国" (The Black Company) is a novel by Glen Cook, and its themes include:
1. Cynicism and nihilism: The story is set in a world where the lines between good and evil are blurred, and the characters are often cynical and nihilistic about the nature of humanity and the world they live in.
2. The nature of power: The novel explores the nature of power and how it corrupts those who wield it. The characters in the story are often forced to confront the darker aspects of power and the consequences of abusing it.
3. The cost of loyalty: The novel also explores the cost of loyalty and the lengths to which people will go to stand by their friends and comrades.
4. The cyclical nature of history: The story is set in a world where history repeats itself, and the characters are often trapped in a cycle of violence and oppression. The novel explores the idea that history is doomed to repeat itself unless people can find a way to break free from this cycle.
5. The importance of identity: The novel explores the importance of identity and the ways in which people define themselves through their actions and beliefs. The characters in the story are often struggling to find their place in the world and to define themselves in the face of adversity.

en.question: What is the primary theme of "The Matrix"?
en.answer:
The primary theme of the movie "The Matrix" is the idea that the world we experience is not always what it seems to be. The film explores the idea that our reality is a simulated construct, created by a powerful entity to distract and control us. The main character, Neo, is eventually awakened to this reality and must fight against the forces that seek to keep him trapped in the simulated world.
The theme of the movie is often interpreted as a commentary on the nature of reality, the power of technology, and the importance of individual freedom and autonomy. The film also explores the idea of the "matrix" as a metaphor for the ways in which society can be controlled and manipulated by those in power.
Overall, the primary theme of "The Matrix" is the idea that reality is not always what it seems to be, and that it is up to the individual to question and challenge the status quo in order to uncover the truth.

fr.question: Quel est le sujet ou thème principal de Matrix ?
fr.answer:
Le thème principal de Matrix est la perte de soi et la découverte de soi. Le film explore les idées de la nature de la réalité, de la conscience et de la liberté. Il met en scène un personnage qui découvre qu'il est en réalité une machine dans un monde simulateur créé par des entités mystérieuses, et qui doit trouver un moyen de s'éveiller et de prendre conscience de sa situation.
Le film aborde également des thèmes tels que la résistance, la liberté, la nécessité de se battre contre les forces de l'oppression et la quête de soi. Il explore également les relations entre la technologie et la société, et les conséquences de l'utilisation abusive de la technologie sur la société et les individus.
En résumé, le thème principal de Matrix est la découverte de soi et la quête de la liberté dans un monde où la réalité est manipulateur et contrôlée par des forces mystérieuses.

es.question: ¿Cuál es el tema principal de la obra The Matrix?
es.answer:
El tema principal de la obra "The Matrix" (1999) de los hermanos Wachowskis es la idea de que la realidad que percibimos como verdadera puede ser en realidad una ilusión o una simulación, y que nuestra percepción de la realidad puede ser controlada por fuerzas más grandes y complejas de las que podemos imaginar.
La trama de la película sigue a Neo (Keanu Reeves), un joven que descubre que la vida que ha llevado en la "Tumba de las luciérnagas" (la realidad que percibimos como verdadera) es en realidad una simulación creada por inteligencias artificiales para mantener a la humanidad en un estado de sueño o de "esclavitud". Neo es llevado a un mundo paralelo, la "Rerealidad", donde descubre la verdad detrás de la simulación y lucha contra los creadores de la Tumba de las luciérnagas para liberar a la humanidad de su control.
Este tema de la simulación y la realidad es desarrollado a lo largo de la película a través de varios elementos, como las escenas de acción y aventuras en el mundo de la Rerealidad, los diálogos filosóficos entre los personajes y los efectos visuales innovadores utilizados para representar la simulación y la realidad.
En resumen, el tema principal de "The Matrix" es la idea de que la realidad que percibimos puede ser una ilusión o una simulación, y la lucha de un individuo para descubrir la verdad detrás de esta ilusión y liberarse de su control.

ru.question: Какова основная тема Матрица?

it.question: Qual è l'argomento principale di Matrix?
it.answer:
Matrix è un film del 1999 diretto da dei Wachowskis e interpretato da Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss e Hong Kong Kong.
L'argomento principale del film è la scoperta della realtà simulata e la lotta contro le forze che la governano.
In particolare, il film affronta temi come la percezione della realtà, la natura della verità, il potere e la manipolazione, la liberazione e la responsabilità.
Il protagonista, Neo (interpretato da Keanu Reeves), scopre che la sua vita non è reale, bensì una simulazione creata da un'entità chiamata "Mulciber" (interpretato da Hugo Weaving), che governa un'altra realtà, chiamata "Zona".
Neo viene contattato da un group of rebels, known as the "Resistance", che combattono contro la "Mulciber" e il suo regime.
Il film è noto per la sua trama complessa, le scene d'azione innovative e la filosofia esistenziale che affronta i temi della realtà, della verità e del potere.

de.question: Was ist das zentrale Thema von Matrix?
de.answer:
Das zentrale Thema von Matrix ist die Idee von einer simulierten Realität, in der die meisten Menschen ihre Wirklichkeit nicht als solche erkennen. In der Geschichte des Films wird gezeigt, dass die meisten Menschen in einer fingierten Welt leben, die von einer künstlichen Intelligenz generiert wird. Diese Intelligenz, die "Matrix", ist eine virtuelle Welt, die von einem superiore Wesen kontrolliert wird. Die Matrix dient dazu, die Menschen in einer endlosen Kette von Abhängigkeit und Sklaventum zu halten.
Protagonist Neo wird von der Wahrheit über die Matrix entlassen und muss sich gegen die Kontrolle der Matrix zur Wehr setzen. Er entdeckt, dass die Matrix nicht nur eine simulierte Realität ist, sondern auch eine Art von Gefängnis, in dem die Menschen von einer künstlichen Intelligenz gehalten werden. Neo und seine Freunde müssen sich gegen die Matrix und ihre Kontrolle zur Wehr setzen, um die Wahrheit zu erkennen und die Sklaverei zu beenden.
Das zentrale Thema von Matrix ist also die Frage nach der Wirklichkeit und der Kontrolle, die uns von außen ausgeübt wird. Der Film fordert die Zuschauer auf, die Wahrheit zu suchen und sich gegen die Manipulationen der Macht zu wehren.

pt.question: Qual é o(s) tema(s) principal(is) de Matrix?
pt.answer:
O tema principal de Matrix é a busca pela verdade e a libertação da realidade simulada. O filme explora a ideia de que o mundo que conhecemos pode ser apenas uma ilusão criada por uma inteligência artificial, e que a verdade está além da realidade física que percebemos.
Outro tema importante em Matrix é a filosofia da liberdade e do determinismo. O personagem Neo descobre que ele é uma criação da inteligência artificial conhecida como Matrix, e que sua vida está sendo controlada por ela. Ele precisa aprender a tomar seus próprios decisões e a se liberar da Matrix, o que é uma jornada espiritual e filosófica.
Ao longo do filme, Neo também enfrenta questões sobre a natureza da realidade e da consciência, e tenta entender se ele pode realmente mudar o curso da história ou se ele está preso em um ciclo de eventos predestinados.
Enfim, Matrix também aborda temas como a política e a sociedade, como a luta contra o poder opressivo e a busca pela justiça. O filme pode ser interpretado como uma crítica às estructuras de poder existentes e às formas como elas podem manipular e controlar a sociedade.

ko.question: 매트릭스의 주요한 테마는 무엇인가요?
ko.answer:
Matrix의 주요한 테마 includes:
1. Illusion vs. Reality: The movie explores the idea that what we perceive as reality may not be the truth, and that there may be a hidden reality beyond what we can see and touch.
2. Free Will vs. Determinism: The Matrix raises questions about the extent to which our choices are free and whether our lives are predetermined by external forces.
3. Perception vs. Deception: The movie highlights the idea that our perception of the world is shaped by the information we are given, and that this information may be manipulated or distorted to serve someone else's agenda.
4. Knowledge vs. Ignorance: The Matrix emphasizes the importance of knowledge and understanding in navigating the complexities of the world, and warns against the dangers of ignorance and complacency.
5. Power Dynamics: The movie explores the dynamics of power and control, both within the Matrix and in the real world, and raises questions about who holds the power and how it is exercised.
6. Identity vs. Alienation: The Matrix examines the nature of identity and the ways in which individuals can become disconnected from their true selves and from the world around them.
7. Technology vs. Humanity: The movie explores the impact of technology on society and the extent to which it can shape our perceptions, beliefs, and values.
8. Collectivism vs. Individualism: The Matrix highlights the tension between collectivist and individualist ideologies, and raises questions about the role of the individual in society.
9. Morality vs. Ethics: The movie raises questions about the nature of morality and ethics, and the ways in which these concepts can be manipulated or distorted to serve someone else's agenda.
10. Consciousness vs. Unconsciousness: The Matrix explores the nature of consciousness and the unconscious mind, and raises questions about the extent to which our thoughts and actions are shaped by these forces.

el.question: Ποιο είναι το θέμα του έργου "The Matrix";
el.answer:
The theme of the movie "The Matrix" is:
1. Illusion vs. Reality: The film explores the idea that what we perceive as reality might be an illusion created by a more powerful entity.
2. Free Will vs. Determinism: The characters in the movie struggle with the idea of whether they have free will or if their choices are predetermined by the Matrix.
3. Simulation vs. Reality: The Matrix is presented as a simulated reality, raising questions about the nature of reality and whether our experiences are truly real.
4. Knowledge vs. Ignorance: The movie highlights the importance of knowledge and understanding in breaking free from the Matrix.
5. Rebellion vs. Conformity: The characters in the film are faced with the choice of rebelling against the Matrix or conforming to it, raising questions about the nature of resistance and the importance of individuality.
6. Technology vs. Humanity: The Matrix is portrayed as a technological construct that threatens to overwhelm and control humanity, highlighting the dangers of relying too heavily on technology.
7. Perception vs. Deception: The film explores the idea that our perceptions can be manipulated and deceived, raising questions about the nature of truth and reality.
8. Liberation vs. Oppression: The movie offers a vision of liberation from oppressive systems, highlighting the importance of fighting against systems that seek to control and dominate.
9. Collectivism vs. Individualism: The Matrix presents a collectivist society that prioritizes the needs of the group over the individual, raising questions about the importance of individual freedom and autonomy.
10. Identity vs. Alienation: The film explores the idea of identity and the search for self-discovery, highlighting the alienation and disconnection that can result from living in a simulated reality.

nl.question: Wat is het hoofdonderwerp van The Matrix?
nl.answer: Het hoofdonderwerp van The Matrix is de simulatie van de realiteit en de ontdekking van de waarheid over de werkelijkheid in het leven van de hoofdpersoon, Neo (gespeeld door Keanu Reeves). In de film wordt Neo gepresenteerd als een persoon die leeft in een virtual reality-wereld, gecreëerd door de Machiavellian "Mother" (gespeeld door Gloria Foster) en haar partner, de "Architect" (gespeeld door Helmut Bakaitis). De film volgt Neos reis om de waarheid over de wereld te ontdekken en te ontvluchten van de simulatie.

zh.question: 《回到未来》这部作品的主题是什么？
zh.answer:
"回到未来" (Back to the Future) 是一部科幻电影，主题包括：
1. 时间旅行：电影中的主要情节是主角 Marty McFly 使用时间旅行机器回到过去和未来，展示了时间旅行的可能性和挑战。
2. 家庭关系：电影也探讨了家庭关系和友谊的重要性。主角 Marty McFly 和他父亲 Robert McFly 之间的关系在电影中得到了高度的刻画，展示了父子之间的爱和互相奉献。
3. 社会背景：电影中也包含了一些讽刺社会背景，如对于1950年代和1980年代的社会和文化现象的描绘。
4. 科学发展：电影中的时间旅行机器和其他科学技术都是电影中的主要突破，展示了科学技术的发展和可能性。

综上所述，"回到未来" 电影的主题包括时间旅行、家庭关系、社会背景和科学发展，这些主题通过电影中的各种情节和情感展示得到了高度的刻画和探讨。

en.question: What is the primary theme of "Back to the Future"?
en.answer: The primary theme of the "Back to the Future" trilogy is the power of time travel and its potential consequences on the present and future. The films explore the idea of altering the past and how it can affect the present and future, as well as the importance of preserving the timeline and avoiding any disruptions to it. Additionally, the trilogy touches on themes of friendship, family, and the importance of learning from the past to shape a better future.

fr.question: Quel est le sujet ou thème principal de Retour vers le futur ?
fr.answer: Le thème principal de "Retour vers le futur" est la temporalité et les conséquences temporelles des actions humaines. L'histoire suit le personnage principal, Marty McFly, qui voyage dans le temps à travers une déviation accidentelle dans le passé, et doit faire face aux conséquences de ses actions sur son propre présent et l'avenir.

es.question: ¿Cuál es el tema principal de la obra Back to the Future?
es.answer:
El tema principal de la obra "Back to the Future" es el viaje en el tiempo y sus consecuencias. La trama de la película sigue a Marty McFly, un adolescente que viaja en el tiempo a la década de 1950 y cambia el curso de eventos en el pasado, lo que a su vez afecta el presente y el futuro de Marty y su familia.
El tema de la obra se centra en la idea de que los cambios en el pasado pueden tener consecuencias impredecibles y complejas en el presente y el futuro, y que la acción que realizamos en el pasado puede afectar la realidad de manera irreversible.
Además, la película también explora temas como la amistad, la familia, la responsabilidad y la importancia de aprender de los errores del pasado para construir un mejor futuro.

ru.question: Какова основная тема Назад в будущее?
ru.answer:
Назад в будущее - фильм 1985 года, режиссером которого является Рой Эрб.
Основная тема фильма "Назад в будущее" связана с темой времени путешествий и изменения истории. Film tells the story of Marty McFly, a high school student who travels back in time to the year 1955 and must ensure that his parents fall in love in order to secure his own existence in the future. The film explores themes of time travel, causality, and the consequences of altering the past.

ja.question: バック・トゥ・ザ・フューチャーのテーマは何ですか？
ja.answer: Back to the Futureのテーマは、時間旅行と未来の可能性です。

it.question: Qual è l'argomento principale di Ritorno al futuro?
it.answer: "Ritorno al futuro" è un film di fantascienza del 1985 diretto da Robert Zemeckis, con Michael J. Fox nel ruolo di Marty McFly, un ragazzo che viaggia nel tempo a bordo di una macchina del tempo. L'argomento principale del film è il viaggio nel tempo e l'incontro tra il passato e il presente.

de.question: Was ist das zentrale Thema von Zurück in die Zukunft?
de.answer:
Das zentrale Thema von "Zurück in die Zukunft" (Back to the Future) ist die Zeitreise und ihre Auswirkungen auf die Zeit und die Menschen. Der Film handelt von der Geschichte eines Jungen namens Marty McFly, der von einem erfinderischen Science-Fiction-Ingenieur namens Doc Brown in eine verspiegelte Version der Jahr 1955 reist, um sich mit Marty junior zu treffen, der in der Jahr 1985 lebt.
Während der Reise werden Marty und Doc Brown von verschiedenen komischen und dramatischen Ereignissen in der Vergangenheit und Zukunft gestört, darunter eine Gruppe von Gangstern, die versuchen, Marty zu schießen, und eine Verlobte von Marty, die versucht, ihn zu verhindern, dass er zurück in die Zukunft reist.
Trotz aller Hindernisse und Konflikte gelingt es Marty und Doc Brown, die Zeitreise zu erfolgreich abzuschließen und Marty zurück in die Zukunft zu bringen.
Das zentrale Thema des Films ist die Frage nach der Zeit und den Auswirkungen, die sie auf uns und unsere Zukunft hat. Der Film untersucht auch die Idee der Zeitlinie und wie sie durch die Zeitreise beeinflusst wird.
Ein weiteres wichtiges Thema des Films ist die Freundschaft und das Verständnis zwischen den Charakteren. Die Beziehung zwischen Marty und Doc Brown ist ein wichtiger Aspekt des Films und zeigt, wie Freunde und Familie uns unterstützen und uns helfen können, in schwierigen Situationen durchzukommen.

pt.question: Qual é o(s) tema(s) principal(is) de Regresso ao Futuro?
pt.answer: O tema principal de Regresso ao Futuro é a exploração da possibilidade de viajar no tempo e os efeitos que isso pode ter sobre as pessoas e sobre o mundo em geral. O filme também aborda temas como a perda, a saudade e a identidade, além de fazer críticas sociais e políticas.

ko.question: 백 투 더 퓨처의 주요한 테마는 무엇인가요?
ko.answer:
Back to the Future's main themes include:
1. Time Travel: The movie explores the concept of time travel and its consequences, both positive and negative.
2. Friendship: The film highlights the importance of friendship and how it can help overcome challenges and obstacles.
3. Self-Discovery: The movie follows Marty McFly's journey of self-discovery as he navigates through different time periods and learns more about himself and his family.
4. Science Fiction: Back to the Future is a science fiction film that explores the possibilities of futuristic technology and its impact on society.
5. Adventure: The movie is an adventure that takes the viewer on a thrilling ride through different time periods, showcasing the excitement and unpredictability of traveling through time.
6. Coming of Age: The film is also a coming-of-age story, as Marty McFly grows and matures throughout the series, facing new challenges and learning valuable lessons about life.

el.question: Ποιο είναι το θέμα του έργου "Επιστροφή στο Μέλλον";
el.answer: The theme of the movie "Return to the Future" (Greek title: "Επιστροφή στο Μέλλον") is the concept of time travel and its consequences on the human psyche. The movie explores the idea of revisiting the past and altering events that have already occurred, and the potential consequences of doing so on the present and future. It also touches on the themes of nostalgia, regret, and the importance of learning from past mistakes.

nl.question: Wat is het hoofdonderwerp van Back to the Future?
nl.answer: Time travel
